casebody.data:
GREYSTONE NEVADA, LLC, a Delaware Corporation; and U.S. Home Corporation, a Delaware Corporation, Appellants,
v.
PHUC LE HUYNH, Individually; Mai Huynh, Individually; Cecil Moore, Jr., Individually; Christina Nardacci, Individually; Alfonso Ramirez, Individually; and Jeanette Wilson, Individually, Respondents. No. 68716 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED NOVEMBER 28, 2018

REVERSED. REMAND.
